subject: America's Cup
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: In the most significant step toward creating a new class of boat for the 34th America’s Cup, some of the world’s leading yacht designers and engineers discussed three options: multihulls of approximately 66 and 82 feet (20 and 25 meters), and a monohull class of up to approximately 89 feet (27 meters).
